import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'], }) export class NavbarComponent { isCartVisible: boolean = false; toggleCart() { this.isCartVisible = !this.isCartVisible; } }
